item.description:
Sorry for the late posting once again ...

 

The good news is that we have found a meeting room and have reserved it for the next 6+ months.  Since we have a meeting location we will posting the next 4 months meetups in the next couple weeks ... stay tuned.

 

Tonight's meeting is going to be a social meetup.  Penny will have pizza available for those who can attend.  Please RSVP as soon as possible so that she has enough pizza for everyone.  We completely understand if you cannot attend tonight, but we hope that you can.

 

The location is new and if you would like directions, there is a map on the school's website.

 

We hope you can make it to tonight's meeting, but if you can't we hope that you have a wonderful St. Patrick's Day!!

 

Renae
item.how_to_find_us: Room HSCI 103 - Go in the main entrance, take a right, it's the 1st room on the right.
item.name: March Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting
